text: Yentl is a 1983 American romantic musical drama movie directed and starring Barbra Streisand and based on the Leah Napolin and Isaac Bashevis Singer play and short story of the same name. It also stars Amy Irving, Mandy Patinkin, Nehemiah Persoff and was nominated for 5 Oscars including one win at the Academy Awards in 1984. ==Other websites== * Category:1983 romantic drama movies Category:1983 musical movies Category:1983 LGBT movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in Poland Category:Movies about Jews and Judaism Category:Movies about Orthodox and Hasidic Jews
title: Yentl
